name: Gravity - Rise Up
description:
The world of Gravity is - ironically enough - one devoid of gravity, and for this reason everything floats before you haphazardly. Fly your way through the infinite sky, but  be careful; things speed up the higher you get.

Thank you to everyone returning from the old version of Gravity! It's taken me a year to remaster this version and I'm so glad to finally share it with you.
